title: Mutyala Haram with Emerald and Ruby Pendant - A Timeless Classic
features: This exquisitely crafted Mutyala Haram features four strands of lustrous natural pearls meticulously strung together. The centerpiece is a stunning pendant with a central Zambian Emerald, surrounded by Polki diamonds. A smaller ruby sits above the emerald pendant, adding a vibrant contrast. The pendant's design incorporates delicate floral motifs and pearl drops, echoing traditional South Indian aesthetics. Finished with the signature Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and a rich, antique look.
occasions: or any special occasion. This haram adds a touch of regal elegance to sarees
description: This Haram is a testament to enduring South Indian craftsmanship, combining the purity of pearls with the vibrancy of emeralds and rubies. The Polki diamonds add a touch of antique charm and brilliance. A true investment piece that can be passed down through generations, embodying cultural heritage and timeless beauty. Each gemstone is hand-selected for its quality and unique character. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and protection against tarnish.
